attrs.name: lg
attrs.desc: Number of responsive grids or grid attribute objects greater than or equal to 1200px, for example, {span: 4, offset: 4}.

attrs.name: md
attrs.desc: Number of responsive grids or grid attribute objects greater than or equal to 992px, for example, {span: 4, offset: 4}.

attrs.name: no
attrs.desc: Sort ID (valid when order is enabled in a row). The default value is 0.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: offset
attrs.desc: Number of grids on the left of the grid. The default value is 0.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: sm
attrs.desc: Number of responsive grids or grid attribute objects greater than or equal to 768 pixels, for example, {span: 4, offset: 4}.

attrs.name: span
attrs.desc: Number of columns occupied by a grid
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 12

attrs.name: tag
attrs.desc: User-defined element label. Any label can be selected. The optional value of this attribute is *
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is div.

attrs.name: xl
attrs.desc: Number of responsive grids or grid attribute objects greater than or equal to 1920px, for example, {span: 4, offset: 4}.

attrs.name: xs
attrs.desc: <768px responsive grids or grid attribute objects, for example, {span: 4, offset: 4}.

attrs.name: move
attrs.desc: Number of grids that move left and right (positive numbers to the right, negative numbers to the left)
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0
